formElement.documentation: Identifies the job for which the spool files are to be listed. Use either the job name and job ID combination or the job correlator to identify the job.
formElement.label: Jobname:

formElement.documentation: Identifies the job for which the spool files are to be listed. Use either the job name and job ID combination or the job correlator to identify the job.
formElement.label: Jobid:

formElement.documentation: Identifies the job for which the spool files are to be listed. Use either the job name and job ID combination or the job correlator to identify the job. To use a job correlator on this request, specify the full job correlator for the job: The 31-byte system portion, a semicolon, and the user portion (up to 32 bytes). The correlator can be one that you have obtained from the "job-correlator" property in a returned JSON job document.
formElement.label: Correlator:

formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Use this header to retrieve a range of records from a spool file. You can specify this range using either of the following formats:
SSS-EEE
where SSS identifies the start record and EEE identifies the end record to be retrieved. Both values are relative offsets (0-based). When EEE is set to 0, records through the end of the spool file are retrieved.
SSS,NNN
where SSS identifies the start record and NNN identifies the number of records to be retrieved.
.
formElement.label: X-IBM-Record-Range:

formElement.htmlDocumentation:
text
The z/OS jobs REST interface translates records from the server codepage to the client codepage and returns the records with Content-Type: plain/text. Trailing spaces are removed and newline characters are used as record separators. This value is the default if you omit the mode parameter.
binary
The z/OS jobs REST interface performs no translation and returns the records with Content-Type: application/octet-stream.
record
The z/OS jobs REST interface performs no translation and returns the records with Content-Type: application/octet-stream. The z/OS jobs REST interface prefixes each record with a 4-byte (big endian) length.
.
formElement.label: Mode:

formElement.documentation: Represents an optionally-specified secondary JES subsystem. A request to a secondary JES subsystem must include the job name and job id, rather than a job correlator.
formElement.label: JESB:

formElement.documentation: Comma separated files list to retrieve.
formElement.label: Files NNNs:

formElement.documentation: Pushes to retrieve the JCL for the specified job.
formElement.label: Retrieve job's JCL:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Property sheet name for results:
